SEARCH
Package com.example.eventease.ui.organizer

Class NotificationHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventease.ui.organizer.NotificationHelper
public class NotificationHelper extends Object
Helper class for sending notifications to different groups of entrants.

This class provides functionality for organizers to send push notifications to:

  • Waitlisted entrants
  • Selected entrants
  • Cancelled entrants

Notifications are sent via Firebase Cloud Functions by writing notification requests to the Firestore 'notificationRequests' collection. The Cloud Functions will then:

  1. Read the notification request
  2. Retrieve FCM tokens for all target users
  3. Send push notifications via FCM
  4. Mark the request as processed

      Sends notifications to all waitlisted entrants for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event
      eventTitle - The title of the event
      message - The notification message (optional, will use default if null)
      callback - Callback for completion/error

    • sendNotificationsToUsers

      public void sendNotificationsToUsers(List<String> userIds, String title, String message, String eventId, String eventTitle, NotificationHelper.NotificationCallback callback)
      Sends notifications to a specific list of users with custom title and message. This is used for replacement invitations and other custom notifications.
      Parameters:
      userIds - List of user IDs to notify
      title - Custom notification title
      message - Custom notification message
      eventId - The event ID
      eventTitle - The event title
      callback - Callback for completion/error

    • sendNotificationsToUsers

      public void sendNotificationsToUsers(List<String> userIds, String title, String message, String eventId, String eventTitle, boolean filterDeclined, NotificationHelper.NotificationCallback callback)
      Sends notifications to a specific list of users with custom title and message.
      Parameters:
      userIds - List of user IDs to notify
      title - Custom notification title
      message - Custom notification message
      eventId - The event ID
      eventTitle - The event title
      filterDeclined - If true, filter out users who have declined
      callback - Callback for completion/error
